title: The Writer's Almanac for Saturday, February 5, 2022
description: Today marks the birth of William S. Burroughs, 1914. The American novelist, poet, and painter is best known for his novel “Naked Lunch.”
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: Today marks the birth of William S. Burroughs, 1914. The American novelist, poet, and painter is best known for his novel “Naked Lunch.”
